title: Peer pressure, drugs and you
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Peer pressure
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenagers
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
description: Using case studies and examples, this program demonstrates assertiveness strategies for resisting peer pressure to use drugs. The program is divided into three parts, with each part examining a different aspect of peer pressure. This program will facilitate role-playing and provide techniques and strategies for resisting peer pressure in a number of situations.
